name: LAST CRASH
description:
We are Emergency Personnel working on behalf of the SUNK company that does biological research. Our task is to analyze the events in the research centers of Sunk company located in different locations around the world. With the world on the brink of destruction, we must find the rare materials that are urgently needed. The melting of glaciers caused by global warming is revealing viruses that bring unprecedented destruction to the world. While performing the missions, we try to survive under difficult conditions by managing resources with special equipment.



WE ARE PLANNING TO BRING ONLINE CO-OP FEATURE TO OUR GAME SOON.


KEY FEATURES



SURVIVE


RESOURCE MANAGEMENT


EXPLORE


INVENTORY SYSTEM


ADVANCED EQUIPMENT

PLEASE SUPPORT US BY ADDING OUR GAME TO YOUR WISH LIST!
